United States social distancing policies for COVID-19

Source: R/us_state_distancing_policy.R
us_state_distancing_policy.Rd

An updated, curated set of social distancing and non-pharmaceutical interventions for states in the United States and District of Columbia.

us_state_distancing_policy()

Source

  • https://github.com/COVID19StatePolicy/SocialDistancing/

Kudos

  • Joe Wasserman: http://www.joewasserman.com/

See also

Other data-import: acaps_government_measures_data(), apple_mobility_data(), beoutbreakprepared_data(), cdc_aggregated_projections(), cdc_excess_deaths(), cdc_social_vulnerability_index(), coronadatascraper_data(), coronanet_government_response_data(), cov_glue_lineage_data(), cov_glue_newick_data(), cov_glue_snp_lineage(), covidtracker_data(), descartes_mobility_data(), ecdc_data(), economist_excess_deaths(), eu_data_cache_data(), financial_times_excess_deaths(), google_mobility_data(), government_policy_timeline(), healthdata_mobility_data(), healthdata_projections_data(), healthdata_testing_data(), jhu_data(), jhu_us_data(), kff_icu_beds(), nytimes_county_data(), oecd_unemployment_data(), owid_data(), param_estimates_published(), test_and_trace_data(), us_county_geo_details(), us_county_health_rankings(), us_healthcare_capacity(), us_hospital_details(), usa_facts_data(), who_cases()

Other NPI: acaps_government_measures_data(), coronanet_government_response_data(), government_policy_timeline()

Author

Sean Davis seandavi@gmail.com

Examples

res = us_state_distancing_policy()

#> Warning: Problem with `mutate()` input `DateEnacted`.
#> ℹ  8 failed to parse.
#> ℹ Input `DateEnacted` is `lubridate::ymd(DateEnacted)`.
#> Warning:  8 failed to parse.
